content:
I decided to not try fixing my last attempt of a production server
but now I can't even install 1.6 normally although everything else was the same. This time postgres gives me trouble. Does anyone have an idea what went wrong?
end-of-install.log
nevermind... sorry to bother again but I did it again, this time I run apt-get update and apt-get upgrade before running the install script and it worked.
